org.codemonkey.swiftsocketclient
Interface ClientEndpoint

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientEndpointTCP, ClientEndpointUDP
interface ClientEndpoint

Abstraction of the client socket. Acts as a wrapper for Socket and DatagramSocket to provide uniform behavior.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema
See Also:
ClientEndpointTCP, ClientEndpointUDP

Field Summary
static org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER
          All subclasses use the logger anchored to ClientEndpoint.class.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Call the close method on the embedded socket (works for both TCP and UDP).
 ServerEndpoint getServerEndpoint()
           
 boolean isClosed()
           
 

Field Detail

LOGGER

static final org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER
All subclasses use the logger anchored to ClientEndpoint.class.

Method Detail

getServerEndpoint

ServerEndpoint getServerEndpoint()
                                 throws IOException
Returns:
An endpoint that acts similarly for a TCP and UDP server.
Throws:
IOException - Thrown by ClientEndpointTCP.getServerEndpoint()

isClosed

boolean isClosed()
Returns:
Whether an explicitly call has been made to close() or close on the passed in socket (both TCP and UDP).

close

void close()
           throws IOException
Call the close method on the embedded socket (works for both TCP and UDP).

Throws:
IOException - Thrown by ClientEndpointTCP.close()
